TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed

Docs.param: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
The child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

Docs.summary: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

Docs.summary: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
Docs.value: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus. For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

Docs.returns: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus. For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.
